column5: This charming cabin is located in a private community near the lake. Included is access to the lake with boat ramp and a dock which you can fish off of. The cabin is located between 2 vacant lots which provide open space and privacy. There is also an RV hook up for your convenience if you need it. Fully furnished with full kitchen, supplies, WIFI and more.
column8: Cozy Comfortable Cabin Near Lake Alvarado
